name: Miniature Boxwood
description: Since it needs minimal sunlight, the boxwood bonsai tree is perfect for an indoor environment such as your home or office. Bonsai tree measures between 8 inch to 10 inch tall potted, and arrives in a 6 inch blue pot.

name: Miniature Little Ollie Olive Bonsai
description: This miniature version of our Little Ollie Olive measures between 10 inch and 12 inch tall potted and arrives in a contemporary 6 inch ceramic pot. Pot may vary depending on availability. Care information included. Bonsai tree shape may vary.

name: Chinese Elm
description: The Chinese Elm Bonsai tree is a very hardy tree that can accommodate indoor and outdoor environments with sufficient natural lighting. Chinese Elm bonsai tree, aged 6-8 years old, currently arrives in a 8 inch brown rectangular pot and measures 12 inch - 15 inch tall potted. Includes decorative stone.

name: Rock Juniper
description: Juniper bonsai, aged 7-9 years old, measures between 12 inch to 15 inch in height potted. Arrives in a 8 inch ceramic pot. Care information included. Exclusively from Eastern Leaf. Bonsai tree shape may vary.
